projects.name: Automated Sequence Generation and Data Prep Toolkit for LC-MS Intact Mass Analysis of Antibody Biologics
projects.description: Developed a toolkit to automate sequence generation and data preparation for high-throughput LC-MS intact mass analysis at Bristol Myers Squibb. Features include: Automated CSV generation for ThermoFisher Xcalibur and Byos workflows, User-friendly GUI (Tkinter), Customizable settings and auto package installation. Impact: Reduced manual setup time from ~15 min to ~15 sec, minimized errors, and improved user experience.Technologies: Python, Tkinter, CSV

projects.name: AI-Enhanced Intact Mass Data Communication: Expert-Level Comment and Automated Visualization
projects.description: Developed an automated tool for expert-level comment generation and interactive visualization of LC-MS data at Bristol Myers Squibb. Features: AI-driven comment generation via Azure OpenAI API (GPT-4.1), HTML-based 96-well plate heatmap visualization, Automated report generation and trend identification. Impact: Automated specialized tasks, improved clarity and consistency, and enabled rapid decision-making. Technologies: Python, Azure OpenAI API, HTML
